main event: On July 22, 1952, a flight of approximately eight unidentified aerial objects was observed over Los Alamos Air Force Base.
interesting points: The objects were described as aluminum or bright metallic in color and estimated to be traveling at speeds exceeding 1,000 miles per hour., Observers noted that the objects could change direction instantly and zig-zagged in the sky., The objects were initially seen hovering and only visible through binoculars., The sighting lasted approximately 25 minutes but was not continuous due to other activities., All witnesses reported the objects appeared to be larger than conventional aircraft.
witness description: Individuals including a supervisor and a cargo pilot observed the objects.
